class_features.name: Specialized Shooting
class_features.description: Choose a weapon type to specialize in. When using a specialized weapon, you deal extra damage of the same type as the weapon, equal to half your level, rounded down.

class_features.name: Deadshot
class_features.description: When you score a critical hit with your specialized weapon type, you do not need to roll damage dice and instead deal maximum damage.

class_features.name: Broad Firing Solution
class_features.description: Whenever you take the attack action using your specialized weapon type, you may make an additional attack as a bonus action using that weapon.
